114.review_title: Great price when I needed it fast.
114.review: I was out of town on business when my son called saying he needed a good DSLR camera by the next morning for one of his classes. So from 2500 miles away I found a great camera on sale and available at a store near him. He picked it up a couple of hours later . The camera is great and the price I paid for the package was a great value ! Things couldn’t have worked out better !
114.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

115.author: Madison
115.review: I purchased this camera to upgrade from my old rebel. This camera has exceeded my expectations. It's easy to use and the buttons are similar to what I am used to from my older model. The extended ISO is perfect for lower light situations. The camera is lightweight and sturdy. The bag that came with the purchase fits so well. I'm even able to put my 50mm lens in the bag and have room but not too much.
115.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

116.author: pkrocco
116.review: I bought this as a gift for my 15 year old who is interested in more than a point and shoot camera. We both couldn't happier! She loves everything about the camera features and I feel I got a great product for the price! If her passion for photography continues it may not be the last camera and lenses she ever owns but it will be perfect for many years
116.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

117.author: Patrick
117.review: I bought this camera for my daughter who loves taking photos and wants to do more than her old camera would allow. This camera allows her to take great photos and change settings for different situations. She loves this camera. We would highly recommend it for beginners or causal family photo taking.
117.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

118.author: Shoppingmadeeasy1
118.review_title: Love it..for taking photos in motion
118.review: The employee was so patient with me. I knew what I wanted but did not know where to begin. I explained what I was looking for in a camera and he patiently showed me everything. So, I had the ability to choose; I was not forced with a sales pitch. What was an even better plus was that he was a photographer himself. He shared his experiences with each type of camera offered. Upon my decision, he said "I have the same one too!"
118.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

119.author: Cris
119.review: Great first digital camera, I'm not a great photographer and have not had much experience taking pictures with these types of cameras. It's fairly easy to use, except at times the camera takes too long to focus. This is difficult when you have little ones who don't always participate like you want them to. Other wise it's really nice, cool screen on the back. I like that you can send your pics to your phone for instant sharing.
119.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

120.author: Lexi
120.review: I bought this camera because my phone was running out of space. I hesitated at first because of the price, but then bought it. Only downside was that I wanted to be able to use a remote to take pictures and this camera did not have that function. I ended up returning it for the t6i which had Bluetooth capabilities. Still s good camera overall.
120.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

121.author: Boo58
121.review_title: amazing camera for beginner or with experience
121.review: This is a great camera to start out with as a beginnner or even for someone more experienced. The price is good for the products too! I bought this camera for school, I've taken photography for the past 2 years, thinking this would get me through just this year until I could buy a better one next year...but I doubt I'll give this one up any time soon. I really do love it!
121.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

122.author: MrsWho
122.review: This is a great starter camera for an amateur photographer or a family to capture photos of everyday life & events. Lightweight, durable, and very user friendly. I'm exploring all the creative options for fun, but the automatic settings are great too. The bundle came with everything I needed except a memory card & tripod. Loving it so far! Glad to finally have a camera that's not on my phone & don't have to pay a professional
122.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

123.author: cpopky
123.review: We purchased this camera for our 14 yr. old daughter, as she is going on a special trip and she has shown a tremendous interest in photography. She has found the camera easy to use and is really enjoying it. Speaking to friends with greater knowledge of, and experience with photography, they almost universally praised Canon. It is a great camera for our daughter's beginning skills with enough flexibility to grow.
123.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

124.author: windows8
124.review: bought this camera to step up my photography skills. I love this camera in the fact that the pictures are better in quality compared to my old camera. the feature I love the most is the wireless connection. I am able to control the camera with my phone. I am able to download my pictures over my home network. In short, this was a good purchase.
124.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

125.author: Golaget
125.review: Got this camera and can't help excitingly tried a few shots over all the scenarios. Wide angle, close up, moving subject, dim light, night time... and keep rotating the two lens... I had lot of fun and made satisfactory pictures, as a beginner. It's a great deal I got at all. Would absolutely recommend to my friends, if the deal (or better) comes up again.
125.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

126.author: CarlSA
126.review: Will keep this review short and simple. This is my first camera, this bundle has everything you need if you're into photography. This, in my opinion is a great camera to start learning on. Super easy to use and very high quality pictures. I've been out shooting the past few days and have taken some amazing pictures. Worth every penny! If you're thinking about buying it, do it! You won't be disappointed.
126.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

127.author: AnaClara
127.review:
I took photography in high school but for film cameras,and then I got in love with taking pictures so decided to buy a camera. This camera is awesome and I'm taking great pictures. It took me like
a week to learn everything about it but it wasn't hard.
127.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

128.author: Yareli
128.review: I bought this camera on Black Friday 2017 and it has been great so far. I’m just still getting the hang of everything but I have managed to take some great shots with my camera. I am not a professional photographer whatsoever and only really bought this camera to take nice pictures of my pets and family or to use in special occasions. I really do think this camera was worth the money.
128.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

129.author: Photonewbie
129.review:
Wow. This camera is so incredibly easy to use. I was shocked at how easy the manual was to understand. We took this camera to a beach in seattle and photographed the waterfront. The pictures came out absolutely stunning! 
Great camera for someone looking to dive into photography.
129.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

130.author: vollmer2010
130.review: Seems like a great camera so far. I like that it's great for a beginner, but still can be great for a professional with some add-ons. The quality of the photos is spectacular with either lens. We are very happy with this purchase. There are a lot of features that I'm honestly not sure how to use yet, but hopefully the manual will be helpful there.
130.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

131.author: PhotoTraveler
131.review: This camera is perfect for someone who is getting started with some more serious photography. Great price for the items you receive and the camera itself takes amazing quality photo for beginners. I am especially a fan of the instant share/connecting to your smart phone option for your photos! Rated 4 stars because the flap that covers the ports doesn't stay on and there is no mic jack. But that's me being picky.
131.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

132.author: Jjmason
132.review: I love the camera, it's has an endless amount of features and modes for taking pic and videos of everything. I especially love how I can press and hold the button to scroll through the pics and while holding it will show them in a slide format. There a lots of instructional videos online on how to operate. The only issues I've had is is does not like to connect to wifi and is complicated to do so
132.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

133.author: Tonyn
133.review:
This camera is so easy to use, people have been amazed at the picture quality. I love the WiFi feature, I can load pictures directly into my iPhone. I can also use my phone to control the camera.

I can’t wait to take one of the beginner courses that they offer at BestBuy.
133.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

134.author: Scrapbookingmama
134.review_title: Great camera that is easy to use
134.review: This is a great camera that is easy to use. The camera takes great pictures so you are able to have memories for a lifetime. Only downfall is that we can not figure out how to download directly into the computer instead of downloading into cell phone. We will be going back to Best Buy for a quick training on uploading pictures as they offer classes on cameras if needed. Would definitely recommend this camera to others!
134.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

135.author: sudoku
135.review: I was looking for something more than just digital camera that take picture like cell phone. This canon T6 is just what I was looking for. It is easy to use and take awesome pictures. Using zoom lens, I will never missed my daughter's school program which I can never get good pictures because I sit too far from stage and she move too much. If you have this type of problem like I did, this is the camera for you.
135.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

136.author: MrMayhem97
136.review: I love the affordability, and the wonderful quality of this camera. If you are looking into canon and aren’t sure about photography wait to get an I series or better. These are much much cheaper and they are only missing a few features. The quality of the photo is pretty much identical
136.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

137.author: NBUL
137.review:
I take quite a few photos from an airplane and have some incredible shots at 500 feet over the Gulf Beaches of sharks. Numerous postcard shots of islands and coastline capture the local areas with ease. Landscapes, people, are a quick adjustment to the camera on land and more beautiful memories are created.

The bundle of camera, lenses and bag is a perfect fit for my needs. Good value bundle.
137.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

138.author: TomD
138.review_title: Beginner or Advanced will love this camera
138.review: I was looking for a fast automatic SLR, and got it, but I also got a camera that allows me to get shots impossible to get with auto features. Battery life is great, and downloading pictures is simple and fast. Image quality is superb.
138.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

139.author: Partist
139.review: I've been using a 35mm film camera for many years to create photos for my fine art. This camera is a revolution for me. It's so much fun to be able to take pics of wildlife that I can paint from. The pictures are really sharp and I can get pics of moving wildlife before they get away. Also it's not too heavy to carry on a hike thru the forest or national wildlife refuge. I highly recommend it.
139.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

140.author: Bill
140.review: My dad got it as a gift for his brother. He has fun with it and likes it. It works well. Comes with a strap, bag, and an extra lens but this isn't really a camera for a beginner. There's a lot of options on it and unless you're familiar with DSLR cameras it takes a while to get the max value out of it. I thought it was quite expensive and could have probably bought it cheaper elsewhere but we were in a hurry.
140.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

141.author: DealFinder
141.review: I bought this camera as a gift to myself for graduating college. I wanted to get into photography as a hobby; I looked online and in stores at a variety of different cameras and ended up purchasing this bundle. This camera has many different features and comes with two lenses along with a bag to carry in. This camera has worked amazing so far and has everything I needed to get started!
141.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

142.author: RamFam
142.review_title: A1 Deal on a Great Gamera
142.review: After looking around for a month I finally settled on this camera for my daughter. She's taking a photography class and this Canon Rebel is a very good camera that won't break the bank. Another retailer had it on sale and Best Buy Price Matched it along with a no interest rate period for 12 months. Solid camera with a great deal!
142.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

143.author: GrammaD3
143.review: I bought this camera package for my husband for his 75th birthday. He has become an amateur photographer and takes quite a few pictures of wildlife in the area. He wanted a better camera with a larger lens to take better pictures. This set was on sale at the time so it was a great deal and perfect for him. He really loves the camera and is having fun learning it's uses.
143.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

144.author: Rolly
144.review_title: I upgrade my camera from T5 to T6 ...so fun to use
144.review: like my T5 camera, so fun and easy to uses... i'm not a professional user but Canon cameras are my name brand of camera...i even bought a 5D for my gift to my in-law and he love it.. well my canon rebel T6 love it with build in wi-fi...what can i ask for , the best camera with the best price !!!
144.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

145.author: MKZ1953
145.review: Having owned a Canon camera previously, it was easy to transition to the Rebel T6 as there are some similar features (I.e., button symbols, delete photos process). The manual for the Rebel is easy to use and understand, with sketches to accompany the written descriptions. The quality of the photos is excellent. Used it for a trip to Italy and am very pleased with the quality for my first attempt!
145.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

146.author: Laney
146.review: I was looking for a camera for film purposes. I wasn't expecting top notch with this one but I needed one for my school projects. When I started filming my first short, I was blown away by how good the quality was for the price that I payed for it. It's an excellent option for personal projects and the kit itself is great. You can get near movie quality by bringing down the exposure to -1 or -2.
146.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

147.author: ALuker
147.review: The wifi connection to the app gets your photos to your phone almost instantly. It gives your the best of both worlds. First you get outstanding pictures with DSLR and lenses that you can't get even with the best new smartphone cameras. Second you still get to post those pictures to the web without the hassle of taking the card out of the camera and copying to a computer then uploading.
147.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

148.author: Alex
148.review: This is a great camera for starters. I told the employees I was using it for video and they neglected to tell me there's no external mic input and I can't return it for a better camera because of the unnecessary 15% charge for returns. So they literally don't want more of my money because of a policy.
148.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

149.author: Utheman007
149.review: Love it, before i used a cheap Nikon point and shoot camera and finally upgraded to a dslr camera love taking beautiful shots with it the lens aren’t the best in the kit but you can still get some great shots with it, get the 50 mm lens for some great portrait shots you won’t regret it
149.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

150.author: Flip3
150.review_title: Ease and convenience plus great photos
150.review: Easy to use; great pictures on scene intelligent mode. Love the viewfinder; the LCD monitor is large and works well for photo review. Battery has a long life. Camera is lightweight and easy to carry when traveling. Only downside is the necessity for changing lenses; however, the process is quick and easy. Good camera (and photos) for those desiring ease and convenience.
150.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

151.author: Jason
151.review: I have never owned an actual camera, and cell phone cameras are the only ones I have used for years. with this being my 1st real camera, it's been a great experience so far! great value, great quality photos, and a great camera to learn with. really looking forward to using it next month on vacation!
151.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

152.author: mikiej
152.review: got an email about the canon rebel t6 dslr camera with EF-S 18-55mm IS II and EF 75-300mm III lens - Black and had been looking to buy a new digital camera. the price was great. the camera is wonderful and takes excellent pictures and works perfect for my needs. I have other canon cameras and have been satisfied with the canon product for a long time.
152.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

153.author: Mona
153.review: I checked prices on this exact item with MicroCenter and Target. MicroCenter had a better price but Best Buy was closer for me. The Best Buy salesman was happy to match pricing as well as answer my questions. I was in and out in no time which is important to me. I always receive excellent service at Best Buy and their cash rebate program is the best!
153.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

154.author: Griff
154.review: After looking around for a suitable camera replacement, I saw the Canon Rebel T6. It's a light weight camera that can get you the results your looking for. It's great for a beginner as well as an intermediate level camera person. It may not have all the bells and whistles but you will be amazed by camera. And the price is also a great!
154.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

155.author: OnyxFox
155.review: Amazing deal on this camera package. Great, mid-level camera package; for the budding photographer. These things were crazy expensive at one time. Much more affordable; as able to purchase for younger brother. So far he loves it. As I am not a professional photographer myself: All I can say is: In my opinion the pictures it takes seem awesome and clear. So far awesome.
155.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

156.author: wstap
156.review: This is a great camera/kit to get started with. Takes really great photos and videos and allows you to learn all the manual camera setting to get the best pictures for the setting. For the price, it's a really nice quality kit. If you're going to be doing a lot of selfie shooting, I would recommend getting the model with the swivel display. But overall, extremely impressed with it.
156.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

157.author: Aimeem
157.review: This was a long needed purchase of a good camera. Did some research and spoke to some great sales people at the store and decided on this camera for price and ease of use for a newbie like me. I don't regret it, this camera is very user friendly and takes great photos with little effort. I've had a fun time playing around with the different settings. Would highly recommend!
157.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

158.author: paul
158.review_title: great canera to pull out of the box and go
158.review: easy to use right away. there are some good features and settings for those that enjoy more advanced photography. takes good photos in low light and I have enjoyed taking photos so much I.havent used the video setting yet. I have had issues with it recognizing points of intrest in frame so it has denied taking a picture when I wanted to
158.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

159.author: Sailormoon253
159.review: Needed a dslr camera, and they recommended this one for me as a beginner. It was easy to use/learn and it came with all the necessities I needed to carry the camera around. The auto focus was something that took me a little longer to learn, but overall worth the purchase. Love the quality of the photos!
159.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

160.author: Jlee
160.review: This camera package was excellent as a beginner! I was often going to professional photographers for family photos and expending 100-250 a session just for rights to the images! I decided to do family photos on my own with this camera package and it was well worth the money!! I am excited to learn more about the camera to use it more often!! Definitely a purchase well spent!
160.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

161.author: Rsmith02181980
161.review: This is a great starter camera this kit was a great Black Friday deal. We are still learning about the camera. It's got a nice feature to transfer pics from the camera directly to you phone so you can edit pictures. Please note a lot of places had this deal from Black Friday however bestbuy had a 32 bit sd card free with this deal and that was the reason we bought it from bestbuy
161.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

162.author: Vince
162.review: This is a solid camera and this package is a good value. However, I ended up returning the camera because it lacked a screen you can flip and see from the front. That is a very important feature if you plan to do video. Canon makes cameras with that feature, but the yare a lot more money. I bought a Panasonic Lumix FZ300 instead.
162.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

163.author: Eskimom
163.review: This was purchased for my great nephew who is a senior and will be taking a photography class. It is similar to the one I own but with some new features. He has always taken off with my camera when he gets the opportunity so felt this is one he would have no trouble getting used to. The clerk who helped me make the purchase was very helpful.
163.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

164.author: jafo8868
164.review: The Canon Rebel T6 kit is perfect. It was bought as a gift for my wife and she loves it. It is her first dSLR camera and she is doing very well learning how to use it. My salesman (I apologize... I forgot his name) was extremely helpful and was spot on when he said the camera was fairly user friendly right out of the box. Thanks Best Buy for your knowledgeable sales associate!
164.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

165.author: ARDI
165.review: I love my new Canon Rebel that I have upgraded to from my previous Canon Rebel Point and Shoot! I am now able to shoot long distances and have more clearer pictures. I even have connected the camera to my smartphone and transfer pictures immediately if I choose. It’s a great camera at a reasonable price.
165.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

166.author: Jeff
166.review: Being a beginner when it comes to using a dslr camera, this canon exceeded my expectations. The pictures that I'm able to take on this are incredible. The addition of wifi and nfc make it very easy to upload your pictures to your smartphone. I plan on upgrading the lenses in the future. This is a camera you can own for the next few years and not have to worry about upgrading.
166.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

167.author: JHawk
167.review: This is a great bundle for anyone looking to get into the world of DSLR photography. The pictures my daughter has taken with this camera are absolutely amazing! Maneuvering the various settings seems to be very easy to pick up, as my teenage daughter had no problem mastering them after awhile. This bundle has just about everything you need to get out a capture the world.
167.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

168.author: luvzforplay1369
168.review_title: I had an old Cannon film camera and love this one
168.review: I m taking my time and learning how to use the Camera and not use the setting that automatically focuses and setting to give you a good picture . I want great settings ! I used a little Nikon digital and took pictures that were in OutlawBiker and Easyriders Magazine ! I had the opportunity to take pictures for people from that This camera will help me do a better job ..
168.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

169.author: KC09
169.review: Getting into photography was something I've always wanted but didn't have the money for and when I finally had the money to afford a camera I chose this one. I absolutely love it. It's easy to manage and takes great pictures. My son rides dirt bikes and it takes great pictures while he is riding! I'm a beginner and this camera has been amazing from set up to quality!
169.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

170.author: PhotographyLover
170.review: The purchase of the camera was an upgrade from the point and shoot that we had previously. This camera is far more advanced, with all of the bells and whistles that we were looking for. While we know that the photographer brings magic to a picture, the equipment certainly gives it excellence and quality that we were looking for. We love the camera and recommend for others.
170.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

171.author: Dennis
171.review: Couldn't resist picking up this Canon REBEL T6 kit at that price. I've used a Canon SLR for years but figured it was time to go digital. So far this camera delivers more than what I expected. It's a bit more advanced than the SLR I have. My SLR lenses don't fit, of course. This kit came with TWO lenses which is really nice. For my purposes I expect it to do more than I need.
171.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

172.author: Benji
172.review: Solid Canon. Same menu and functionality as their point-and-shoots but obviously a better camera. Smaller lens doesn't work as well with landscape photography... seems better for portraits. (Some pro photographer out there is probably saying "duh" but I'm a novice.) Like the camera overall. Recommend playing with it in a store before purchase, though, to get a feel for it.
172.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

173.author: sdkb
173.review: Bought this camera to take pics of our family vacation to Florida for Easter 2018. Best decision made for this trip, we are still sorting and printing through the hundreds of pics taken. Ideal for an amateur photographer dad since you can take as many as you want while you feel your way around the features of the camera.
173.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

174.author: Teriseanne
174.review: I am obsessed with my camera. It takes amazing indoor and outdoor photos and is so user friendly. It’s been a blast learning the capabilities of this thing. I typically find myself utilizing the lense that came with the camera and it shoots like a charm!
174.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

175.author: ProudHuskieMom24
175.review_title: Best Camera For my college graduate
175.review: My son graduated from a four year college this month. He expressed several times he wanted a camera. He was so surprised when he opened the package. I went all out because he did too. He got his degree. He went to Tahiti two weeks ago, took great photos and expressed how easy it was to use. I’m so pleased.
175.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

176.author: Calico
176.review_title: Great camera for a beginner, or back up camera
176.review: Very good crop sensor for a starting photographer; also a great back up camera for the professional photographer on the go.The T6S and T6i are both very good. I recommend the T6S for the professional looking for a solid back-up camera; and the T6i for the beginner looking for a nice camera to learn the ropes with.
176.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

177.author: howdy
177.review: This is my first DSLR camera. The previous ones I had were the point and shoot kind or those with integrated lenses for zooming only. I bought it for artwork documenting (sketches and paintings). The quality of images are amazing! I can see the strokes of charcoal with great detail. I'm exited about getting into the basics of photography with this camera.
177.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

178.author: PhotoMushCRAZY
178.review: This kit was purchased as a gift. I would rate this a 5 star if this kit had included a newer model of the 75-300mm lens with the stabilizer as it is difficult to get detailed photos without a tripod. The 18-55mm lens has been the most used lens due to the stabilizer.
178.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

179.author: Kay1234
179.review: This camera takes awesome quality pictures. There isn't many YouTube videos on how to use this so, if your interested you'd need to take your time and read the manul to take better pictures. For even better quality I suggest going to your local book store to purchase a book so that they can show you step by step of how to work your camera and to improve.
179.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

180.author: Gardenlady
180.review: I read reviews before going to my local Best Buy. It was a choice between 2 cameras. Once I picked it up and started looking at the dial choices, I started playing with it. Each dial will tell you what it does and what picture choices it would be best for. It takes lovely photos and feels good in the hand. Great first good DSLR camera.
180.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

181.author: Francisco
181.review: My wife loves this camera. It's got all the bells and whistles she wants to get a more professional feel for her pictures that a simple point-and-shoot camera can't provide. However, you should probably buy a book or take a class to truly unlock everything this camera has to offer. Battery life is amazing and the wifi feature makes transferring pictures a snap.
181.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

182.author: DrgRacr
182.review_title: Great first step into the world of DSLR
182.review: I bought this camera for my daughter so I could get flooded with pics of my grandsons ;) I compared several brands/models before choosing this one. I felt the user interface was more intuitive for someone not that familiar with a DSLR, and the price for this kit (camera body, two lenses, and case) was very good for what you get.
182.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

183.author: bjl212
183.review: I actually bought this camera several years ago for my son, my daughter is interested in photography so I bought her the same one! It is great for a beginner, but can grow with her as she improves, takes great pictures, is easy to use, and the bundle package was a great deal.
183.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

184.author: Cmpowers35
184.review: I have really enjoyed using this camera. Pretty easy to take good photos out of the gate and with some YouTube help you can get more sophisticated. In an age where phone cameras are pretty awesome it seems hard to justify a DSLR, but this was worth it.
184.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

185.author: Monica
185.review: Have always wanted a camera like this one...still learning all the ins and outs but so far its a great camera and would reccmmend it to first time beginners and great for the price. Love that it also came with a bag, strap and even another lens. Thumbs up!
185.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

186.author: Devyn
186.review: This is overall a great camera. The quality of the photos are amazing and so clear, it makes them look almost professionally taken. The wifi converting feature in which the camera takes the pictures from itself and uploads them to your phone makes it so much easier and hassle free when it comes to uploading them to social media. In my opinion it's a great overall camera.
186.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

187.author: Pickens
187.review:
I needed a camera for my granddaughter. I looked on the web site and found one exactly what she would need. She was leaving on vacation to explore the west with her parents. I went to BestBuy and purchased the
camera. Great help at Best Buy got the deal done in no time. Great folks to do business with. Got my first picks this week. They look great!
187.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

188.author: Choocher
188.review: I was hesitant to get this because I always thought to myself that our smartphone cameras were good enough. But my mind was changed after using this Canon. There is a noticeable difference between the Canon and my Galaxy S7. My mind has been changed.
188.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

189.author: Kissofdeath
189.review: Great camera so far so good. Easy to use tone of information for beginners online and NFC, WiFi capabilities make it that much more convenient to upload stuff in few seconds. Recommend to anyone and everyone. Only downside I wish it had more megapixel but unless you are enlarging the pic to gigantic size I think it's still very good for what it is.
189.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

190.author: Mariovq35
190.review: I am really pleased with this camera. im not an expert but everything is easy to use. I really like the feature that I can control the camera from my phone which helps take those big family pictures and allows easy access to all the pictures from the phone as well. definetly worth it!
190.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

191.author: LadyT
191.review: I purchased this kit during the Black Friday sale. I am still learning how to use the camera, but the manual has been helpful. The camera bag and strap seem to be of good quality. I am able to fit both lenses in the one bag. I haven’t had any issues with the camera. I would recommend it to anyone looking to start using a DSLR.
191.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

192.author: RoxDaFox
192.review_title: Awesome set for new cameras enthusiast!
192.review: I bought this for my niece as an awesome present for doing excellent in school. Well deserved I might add! It turned out to be the best thing ever. Has everything for a beginner set and the quality of the pictures are beautiful. Camera is light weight an easy to manage. Interchangeable lens are user friendly and easy to use. I would definitely buy this again!
192.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

193.author: Royal
193.review:
I've had digital camera for years but wanted to upgrade. After checking out many dslr's , I found that this was the best deal on the market. After purchasing the Eos Rebel T6 I found that it is an amazing camera, it is loaded with features. I'm still figuring out all the great functions available on it to help you take the best images possible.
Love It !
193.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

194.author: jjcal
194.review: I found this camera to be lightweight and practical but at the same time, filled with features such as WI-FI, Two included Lenses, Lens Case and SM card. I also have a Nikon 7000 series, but this camer is great for a casual dinner night or any time when I do not want to carry the added weight.
194.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

195.author: Abhi
195.review: I had a Nikon D3K prior to this and was an extremely satisfied user. My camera got misplaced and i was recommended to buy a Canon by a friend. This was on a promotion and I picked it up. Super impressed with the results... definitely better than the Nikon i had previously and the models are comparable in terms of price etc
195.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

196.author: Mark
196.review: It seems everyone in my family has one model or the other of Canon Rebel cameras. I needed something for photography class and knew this was what I wanted. It's done everything I've needed so far and I've only BEGUN to use some of the features. The package with two lenses lets me capture images near and far with no problem at all.
196.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

197.author: BigPapa
197.review_title: Great Purchase and Pic Quality for Beginners
197.review: I purchased this package so that I could take quality action shots of my son playing football. From high in the stands I get great closeup photos. This camera includes a detailed book on use but have yet to read it. I'm still able to take great quality pictures. Would strongly recommend for individuals wanting to enter photography.
197.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

198.author: Manbear
198.review: This was my 1st DSLR. Have learned a lot with it. While the kit lens arent the best, they do the job. I learned to shoot RAW and edit all my pics in Lightroom to get the best out of it. With the right lens, you can get great pics.
198.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

199.author: Amit
199.review: I got this camera on the day I was leaving on an Alaskan cruise. I did not do much research so wanted to get something that was the lowest price. Got this for $500 with the additional lens! I loved the pictures it took ... point and click ... during my Alaskan trip! No issues yet and goving 4 start since i am yet ro use the 70 mm zoom.
199.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

200.author: Camerabuyingdad
200.review_title: Good camera for someone with a little camera knowl
200.review: We bought this camera for my daughter who took camera classes in high school. This model is a few steps up from the one she used in class. Her photo shop teacher recommended this model..She is really enjoying the camera taking pictures of everything she finds interesting. The sale was a good price for everything that came in the kit.
200.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

201.author: Anonymous
201.review: I had a Rebel EOS that was about 10 yrs old and was still working very well with no problems. My former Rebel decided to take a dip in the Arabian Ocean and of course drowned. Because it was such a great camera, I decided to purchase another Canon Rebel and so far am very pleased with this one too. Actually I love it
201.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

202.author: Mauricio
202.review: I always liked photography and this camera is the perfect first camera. It is very easy to use in Auto setting but also in manual setting. I have taken great pictures so face and have yet to explore my camera even more. Excited to continue to practice my hobby with this wonderful camera.
202.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

203.author: RayB
203.review: I'm certainly not a photographer, but I bought this camera because I wanted to start taking my own family portraits. My phone takes great pictures but is very limited, so I wanted an upgrade. I think it's important to read as much info about this camera as you are able to because it will help you to take better pictures and achieve what you desire.
203.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

204.author: laurenmclayne
204.review: I had only used point and shoot cameras before purchasing this one. This dslr is pretty easy to use, though I am still learning more. The pictures come out really great even if you're not good with getting the perfect light, angle, etc. I am starting to explore the video recording on this camera now. I'm happy with my purchase.
204.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

205.author: charliedrama21
205.review: This was one of the items i was looking out for during black friday. I didnt think the store i go to would have it. Was only supposed to buy a printer but we saw this baby lying in the toy section. Great starter kit in my opinion since my wife wanted to take up photography. Came with the two lens and a bag. And so far shes loved using the camera
205.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

206.author: Alan
206.review: I bought this camera for stop motion photography so I don't use a lot of its functions, I didn't realise that I had to remove the battery in order to recharge it, and you can't plug in a AC adapter, other than that it works great. Check out firststopmotionattempt on YouTube.
206.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

207.author: Super718
207.review: The Canon EOS Rebel T6 is a great camera. I purchased it for taking sport shots for a child's game. The Canon has 18MP And the T6 offers Wi-Fi with NFC for easy photo sharing when you're out-and-about. Make sure you purchase the SD card - 10 class card.
207.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

208.author: kyletech
208.review_title: Very good camera for an intermediate user
208.review: This camera has all of the features I'll be needing for a very long time. Previous camera is a Canon SX20IS. This camera allows using the viewfinder for recording videos. The Canon Rebel T6 is an SLR unit, and does not allow using the viewfinder for video. It remains to be seen how visable the LCD screen will be in very bright sunlight.
208.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

209.author: TheMightyShamrock
209.review: It took me a while to decide between the Canon T6 or the Nikon package version. I am happy with the end decision. The camera takes wonderful pictures and I love the options that came in the Canon package. Works well, easy to connect to phone through app and computer.
209.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

210.author: Nighthawk
210.review: I honestly don’t know anything about cameras but this camera is fairly easy to use for the average joe. Does everything you want it to do and I think the best part is that it has WiFi capabilities which allows you to transfer photos via WiFi connect through the specific canon app. Worth the money
210.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

211.author: Sankofa06
211.review: This is my first digital SLR and I must say I'm in love. It's simple and easy to use. I was a little skeptical at first when purchasing the digital SLR due to the fact I thought it would be hard to use. I definitely recommend this Canon camera for first time users. Trust me you won't be disappointed at all!
211.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

212.author: Debbie
212.review_title: No one can take bad pictures with this camera
212.review: I recently went on a 2 week vacation across the country and I bought this camera to get some pictures for the folks back home. One person told me that the pictures looked like they came out of a magazine and that I was an amazing photographer. All I did was point and click. With the cameras settings Antonella can look like an amazing photographer.
212.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

213.author: ATopete
213.review: This is a great camera for someone looking to capture those special moments with much higher quality photos than with a smart phone. The camera has many advanced features that can be learned with practice and constant use. The quality and durability is far above average and very reasonable for the price.
213.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

214.author: Russ
214.review: Wonderful camera. Have owned an older canon for years but forgot it while going on vacation to europe. Stopped in and picked this up on the way to the airport. Camera is easy to use and the additional lens 75-300, is nice and compact. Package comes with a bag which holds all of the lenses, camera and accessories.
214.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

215.author: mediatorr
215.review: My son wants to get serious about photography and move beyond using his phone or a point and shoot camera. The Rebel has it all. The great thing is that it can take him from a completely automatic mode (much like what he's been using) to a very knowledgeable photographer as he learns more about the various settings and how to use them.
215.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

216.author: DDCC
216.review: It was a nice camera, I purchased this one and a nikon d3400. They are both pretty much the same. I liked the quality of the photos, but it's definitely heavier than the nikon. I ended up selling the cannon to a girl I work with who LOVES cannon and is a photographer. I only chose the nikon because of weight and snapbridge capabilities.
216.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

217.author: MeRob
217.review: This camera is both high quality and a great value. Comes with both lens sizes 18-55mm and 75-300mm. If your a beginner like I am this is plenty to cover a great deal of ranges. 18-Megapixel is plenty for high quality images. This is also a wireless camera so you can connect it to the app on your phone and instantly share your images.
217.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

218.author: adri06
218.review: It's a great camera I purchased it at an even better price. The quality is great.The only issue I have is that some of the settings you have to use the flash. I prefer to take pictures with natural lighting other than that the quality of the pictures are great I can't wait to go out on adventures with it.
218.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

219.author: German
219.review: This is the second time I have purchased this camera--both as gifts. The recipients cannot say enough great things about them. Ease of use and sharpness of photos in various lighting make taking photos enjoyable. You don't have to be a professional photographer to take professional-looking photos.
219.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

220.author: Mally
220.review_title: Great camera for people who love taking pictures.
220.review: I'm highly pleased with my first camera. It was extremely easy to understand and navigate through. I've taken it to several traveling sites, and managed to take excellent pictures. The quality of the pictures make this camera worth buying. I highly recommend this camera if this is the first purchase.
220.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

221.author: slagman
221.review: I bought this camera for my wife who has a point and shoot canon with an optical viewer. The reason I picked this camera is for the same reason. She refuses to give up her point and shoot so I am using the Canon - EOS Rebel T6 DSLR. And I really like it! You can actually compose a picture outside when the sun is shining!
221.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

222.author: Corey
222.review: I bought this camera to get pictures of wildlife and it had turned out to be with me everywhere from taking pictures to wildlife, airplanes. It makes someone like me who never owned a camera look like I've been taking pictures for years. Great camera
222.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

223.author: Jerry
223.review_title: Excellent camera yet very simple to use
223.review: This camera is an excellent camera to use especially if you are barely beginning as a photographer it takes very high quality pictures yet is very easy to use and not too expensive for how good the pictures are i would honestly recommend this camera to any beginners or any person just looking for a good camera.
223.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

224.author: junie
224.review: I bought this camera for my 17 yo niece who is starting a hobby. I was skeptical at first because the operations and many features may be overwhelming for her. But boy I was wrong ! There she goes learning new things everyday with the camera, excitement all day, everyday !
224.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

225.author: Lkeller8
225.review_title: You get what you pay for.
225.review: In my opinion this camera is great for beginners. It gives you the ability to grow and learn along the way. It has the quick auto function for when you are being lazy or just don't have the time to set, focus and shoot. The burst function is good to catching just the right moment in action shots.
225.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

226.author: jlpemberton300
226.review: The package is unbeatable on price! It had everything that is needed to get you up and running, taking pictures almost instantly. Skip the package with the memory card included as the price for the card is much cheaper if you buy it seperately.
226.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

227.author: Luvmycamera
227.review: All I hoped it would be super pictures and easy use. Looked at various makes and models. After seeking help for Best Buy employee made my decision for this camera. Photos are excellent in color and clarity. What I lack in camera knowledge the camera takes over. I recommend this product to beginners and intermediate photographers.
227.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

228.author: Momof4
228.review: I am having an absolute blast with my camera! I took amazing pictures on the auto settings without having to spend hours in the manual learning how to take great pictures. If you want to take it farther, the manual is there to help. Would definitely recommend this product!
228.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

229.author: ChrissyShine
229.review: I loved photography in High School and College but then life took over. I'm wanting to get back into it and this a great starter camera to re-teach myself on since I haven't used a manual since a 35mm. I would recommended this camera to any beginner.
229.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

230.author: Suncrab
230.review: This was a gift for my adult daughter who is going out of the country on a vacation to some scenic places. My wife and I have the T1 and have been very pleased. So far I have heard good things about this camera from my daughter as she practices before her departure later this month.
230.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

231.author: Bowiezzence
231.review: I purchaaed this camera for a crosscountry road trip at the last minute. With beginners luck, this has been the best purchase this summer. My daughter has gravitated to the camera and has taken a liking to photography. The camera is easy to use and takes wonderful photos, as if I know what I am doing. I am glad I made this investment
231.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

232.author: JaySonLee
232.review_title: Great entry level, yet room to grow
232.review:
First DSL camera and love it. 
Much better then any cell camera. Both lenses are great but you for sure can upgrade over time if you find the need. 
Bag is ok that it comes with but will need to upgrade due to the fact that it barley fits everything that comes with.
232.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

233.author: Jacob
233.review: This camera is awesome and is my first camera that's not a basic point-and-shoot. There was a lot of learning to do a lot of things you take for granted what the point-and-shoot but now you have total control over your pictures how they look focus on manual mode and the quality is superb and I got a great deal on Black Friday
233.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

234.author: Mimi
234.review: I purchased this camera to allow me to get the zoomed in shots that I couldn't get with my iPhone, and that's exactly what has happened. I've taken some classes locally to help me learn to manually set the camera, etc. I'm very happy with it.
234.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

235.author: DKHomerson
235.review: I received he camera as a Christmas present. I then took it on a trip to NYC. The camera took wonderful, high-definition pictures. Easy to use. I wanted this a starter camera to get beyond just taking phone pictures. Much better then a point and shoot. The lens were very easy to learn and use as well. Definitely recommend.
235.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

236.author: John
236.review: I use this camera for area's where I don't feel comfortable taking some of my more expensive equipment, but overall this is a great camera that doe not sacrifice quality because of the price. I would strongly recommend to anyone doing this professionally or just looking for a hobby.
236.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

237.author: Anna
237.review_title: Amazing camera for a first time user
237.review: The camera is easy to navigate and can use the defaults rather than using the manual settings in the beginning as I am a beginner to photography on DSR cameras. The still pictures came out beautifully focusing on the up close details of flowers, for example. The camera captures great colors and it is easy to download to ipads.
237.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

238.author: Khush
238.review: I have purchased this camera in black friday deal. Since it is my first DSLR so i was bit nervous before purchasing but recently i have clicked so many photographs from this camera and when i saw them on my PC, i was stunned. It is really nice deal and camera picture quality is really good. Anybody can go for this product.
238.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

239.author: Vheming
239.review: This was the best bang for my buck I caught it on sale and was sold. At first I want happy because it wasn't the T6i but I got over it. The on screen display solved my issue immediately. This is my first DSLR camera and i don't see my self upgrading any time soon!! I might upgrade the lens though!
239.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

240.author: Momof3
240.review: Bought this for my young adult daughter for her 19th birthday. It is her first "real" camera. She absolutely loves it. It takes great pics and the wi-fi connectivity allowing her to download pics to her phone from the camera is relatively simple and works well.
240.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

241.author: Shelly
241.review: I've be shopping for a camera for sometime now. I never found the right one with the right deal until Mother's Day of this year. I take pictures of everything the kids, the cows, etc. I'm so happy with my new camera I can't wait to go on vacation with it.
241.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

242.author: Vonnie
242.review:
This a great camera, have not had it long, still learning how to operate it. I do know that it takes beautiful picture, I liked the ideal of not having to purchase replacement batteries always.
I would certainly recommend this camera to a friend
242.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

243.author: BirdLover
243.review: I received this camera as a Christmas gift from my husband. I love it! It's pretty easy to use. It comes with a detailed instruction manual which I am still in the process of reading. I have taken some great pictures of my grandson playing baseball and also flowers and birds.
243.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

244.author: AAFIBEA
244.review: Recently took a DSLR class at my university I went out and purchased an expensive camera most of the younger students in the class used this identical camera and the same results or better sometimes. My daughter now decided to take the class herself and is enjoying the use of this camera and the pictures she takes.
244.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

245.author: Artsy1
245.review: I have been visiting museums abroad. I have been allowed at a few to take pictures but the flash is not allowed to be used. The pictures have been absolutely perfect just using the automatic no flash feature. I am amazed at the clarity and light that camera finds all on it's own! The best purchase ever!
245.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

246.author: OldYankee
246.review: I have owned the Canon Rebel T5 for 8 years and loved it. I lost it in a fire and needed a replacement. The T6 is just better in all respects. The resolution is so much better. The battery life has improved. The combination of 2 lenses makes it so easy for me to shoot my best pictures in any situation.
246.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

247.author: AnaMaria
247.review_title: Pretty nice camera for the price
247.review:
I'm new to photography and decided to buy this one because it comes with two lenses. So far I'm very happy with the quality of photography and all the features of the camera. 
The fact that it makes videos too and offers the possibility to add accessories like microphones and flashes.
247.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

248.author: ThaReaper2b
248.review: This kit comes with a pair of lenses and the latest cannon rebel eos camera (t6) with a charger and bag. This has been a great tool on our vacation and my wife loves how easy it is to use. It is so easy to use with just one hand and takes some really clear and beautiful pictures. Well worth the money.
248.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

249.author: Wolfhound101
249.review_title: A camera for people wanting to get more creative.
249.review: I have had Canon cameras in the past and have always been impressed with their quality and ease of use. The Canon Rebel T6 is no exception. I haven't given it a serious test yet because of the extreme cold wave, but just by testing around the house, the results have been impressive.
249.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

250.author: Dyson1
250.review:
Canan T6 camera with an extra lens and pouch at price of 450. wow.
I was looking for a quality camera for few months but everything was so costly.
Then came this deal on bestbuy black friday and I got it. I am loving it because it has so many features. The image quality is amazing.
250.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

251.author: Vinny0026
251.review: This is a great Camera and its ready to go right out of the box. The automatic features work great - and I'm currently trying to learn all the other settings. You really cant go wrong with this deal and with the bundle you get the extra lens and also the bag which also help to make this a great deal
251.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

252.author: TammyC
252.review_title: My daughter is super excited about this camera.
252.review: My daughter chose this camera after reading up on it. She is very excited about the wi-fi feature. The sales person sold us on the additional savings packet that comes with an additional lens and camera bag. We both will enjoy this purchase. We decided Geek Squad would be a good idea as well. Ready to get started.
252.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

253.author: Cjobrien
253.review_title: Excellent deal on a great camera bundle
253.review: This is not my first DSLR camera, but the bundle deal on this Canon was an excellent price and the reviews were all good from beginners to professionals. I have not really had a chance to use it and learn all the features, but can say the quality of the product is very good, camera is light and easy to hold.
253.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

254.author: SmittySmitt
254.review: This camera was the perfect gift for my wife who is a novice photographer that wants to take her hobby to the next level. It's easy to use, the extra lens and memory disk was great, Wi-Fi is great for instant printing, and the sale price was really good.
254.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

255.author: BertaF
255.review: I've been using a Canon DSLR for years and this is my third. Biggest difference with this model (besides increase in megapixels) is the wifi feature. So convenient and easy to use so when I need a 300 mm zoom to capture the shot, I can upload to Facebook or other internet site without first uploading to my PC.
255.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

256.author: MsPrecious
256.review: For a beginner, this camera has been nothing but great. The picture quality is very good. I haven’t done any videos so I am not sure about the videos part, but I take pictures like every single say. I love it!!
256.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

257.author: Amanda
257.review_title: Great for starting out. Splendid picture quality.
257.review: This camera is a great starter camera. I'm still learning this on the camera, such as, tweaking settings and such. This camera has such a great picture quality to it and I really enjoy the blur setting to make the foreground and/or background pop. Had a comfortable feel to it when shooting photographs.
257.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

258.author: NeilPorcel
258.review_title: Great camera for beginner and intermediate users
258.review: I love this camera. The instruction booklet that comes with camera got me taking pictures as soon as I got the camera out of the box. Best buy sent me a link with tutorials on how to use the camera. The bundle price was great.
258.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

259.review: Great camera! I needed a lot of help choosing a really good camera to upgrade to. The customer service I received at Best Buy was exceptional! He was very knowledgeable and educated me on just about every camera they carried. I chose this e and am very satisfied. It’s an excellent camera .
259.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

260.author: Sarah
260.review: I bought this for a friend's daughter who is interested in photography. They didn't want to put a lot of capital out for someone that is just testing the water. This is a great camera for someone who would like to get into the field and to learn on. Basic settings are nice and the built-in WiFi is a huge plus.
260.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

261.author: thisolemom
261.review_title: Great Value and Easy to Use
261.review: Great camera and lens for the price. Easy to use and easy to read instructions. Takes beautiful pictures. I bought it for a family vacation and loved it so much I use it to photograph pictures for my food blog. I recommend this camera ..can't beat the price! Fantastic price for a camera, two lenses, and camera bag!!
261.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

262.author: HiaBoy
262.review:
Works smoothly, transitions well under different light conditions. 
Almost as easy as a point and shoot camera but gives user the capability to purchase .other lenses for a more refine usage and greater creativity. 
AN EXCELLENT ENTRY LEVEL. CAMERA.
262.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

263.author: DDsNana1
263.review: I've been wanting a better camera than the one I had and so far this one has been great. Still learning all the ins and outs, but so far I've gotten some really great pictures with it.
263.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

264.author: Jeepmechx
264.review: Camera was recomended by a friend who is a photographer, as a good choice for a novice like myself. He was right, easy to use, great pics, and all the features i could want, and the bundle was a great value.
264.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

265.author: Webb
265.review: This is a great camera for a beginner. I’ve had a huge interest in photography and researched prior to purchasing. It’s very user friendly and the good thing about it is you can interchange lenses w ease. It’s been fun so far. Would recommend for anyone that is just starting off!
265.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

266.author: Km65
266.review: I am enjoying the T6 Rebel! This camera has a lot of settings that I am still learning more about every time I take pics. It helps to have two different lense types for picture taking. I look forward to adding to my lense types for more variety of pictures. I recommend this camera for beginners like me.
266.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

267.author: Rach52
267.review:
This was purchased for my teenage son, who is very much into photography. He needed a new camera for a class at school and the DSLR we had was quite old (13 years to be exact). 
This has all the bells and whistles that he needs right now. The extra lens was a hit and is allowing him to learn even more.
267.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

268.author: Momofteens
268.review: My daughter has been taking a photography class in school for the past 2 years. She uses the school camera. For her last year I bought her this camera. She is loving it. She already knows how to use it and is taking amazing pictures.
268.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

269.author: Jvickery
269.review_title: Great deal for a great camera
269.review: I decided to get this kit for my teenage son who is just getting into filmmaking and photography and it’s fantastic. It has the quality level of prosumer cameras (a big step up from filming on the phone), but is small and lightweight too. I’m very happy with this purchase.
269.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

270.author: Nick
270.review:
I gifted this to my friend on his weeding and he loved it!
We took all our pictures from this new DSLR and it's spectacular!
The added lens of 75-300 mm was just added bonus with this camera.
Only thing missing was a memory card that we had to purchase from extra!!
Overall my best buy from bestbuy!
270.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

271.author: qtdnguyen
271.review: I was looking for a good deal on a camera for an upcoming trip and stumbled upon this awesome one. This kit came with a lens perfect for portrait photos and one that takes beautiful landscape photos. It's great for beginner/ameteur photographers who want to expand their abilities.
271.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

272.author: garys760
272.review: Purchased the Cannon Rebel EOS T6 kit, purchase come with an 18-55mm wide angle and the 75-300mm zoom. Both lens are of standard quality and work well for my use as a non-professional photographer. The camera body is also a nice fit for my needs. I would recommend to the beginner photographer.
272.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

273.author: Leeonidas
273.review: I've switched from Nikon to Canon, just a personal preference. I'm a photographer and I love the smoothness of the Canon camera's and their lens. The pictures come out great, a different color and very easy to use.
273.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

274.author: Cj2290
274.review: Love love love this camera. I came in just for the camera it self but was told about this bundle with a extra bigger lens for a bit more money and I gladly took it. I bought it to use at a special occasion and everyone loved how the pictures came out so nice a clear
274.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

275.author: Camera
275.review: I am in LOVE with the pictures this camera captures! It is so simple to use and takes amazingly clear pictures. It is very lightweight as well. The bonus tripod is great as well. This is all around a great buy and Best Buy offers a fabulous deal!
275.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

276.author: Pacha921
276.review: Have been taking the camera out during the day to "practice"with it. Upgraded from a 10 year old DSLR canon as couldn't do all I wanted it to and we have a 2 week vacation in Hawaii that I wanted to make sure to come home with outstanding photos.
276.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

277.author: Mike
277.review: The Cannon E0S is a great camera for its price Has tons of features that let you take pictures like the pro's. It also has a bunch of connectivity features that you would only expect to see on more expensive models. Great camera at a great price.
277.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

278.author: RueY
278.review_title: This is the 2nd Canon Camera we have bought. Love
278.review: The lens are awesome and camera is easy to use for beginners too. This time we are using the app that uploads the pics to our phone. Fantastic feature! The deal was great with an accessory pack included. We have taken it out a few times & next month looking forward to a coastal trip with it.
278.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

279.author: Mauri
279.review: I bought this camera as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it! He has never owned a professional camera before and this was so easy to use he picked it up right away. I love that it comes with a carrying case as well as an extra lense.
279.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

280.author: Germanduck12
280.review_title: Great camera, easy to use and handy
280.review: Bought this camera after long consideration but have not regretted the decision a bit. It is easy to use and even a beginner can get some great shots out of it without much explanation. The extra lenses are a good investment though if you're going for artistic pictures.
280.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

281.author: Cipiko
281.review: I bought this camera for my wife and 2 teenagers. I like Canon cameras since menu is very simple and easy to go. They like Macro mode since this mode provide very clear and sharp detailing. I would like to recommend this camera for beginners and teenagers since it is very handy and light.
281.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

282.author: LAFitbit17
282.review:
Cannon puts out great products and this camera has enough bells n whistles. With the extra lense and big case you can't go wrong!! Watch Best Buy's ads and you can get a pretty good deal, well worth the price!! 
There's a lot to learn for a beginner but pretty easy to learn. 
You can't go wrong
282.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

283.author: Cameraphobic
283.review: Bought for my daughter who has been taking photography classes in school and really enjoys them and seems to have a knack for taking good pictures. . She loves the fact that she can download to her phone and look at the pics and then send them right away to whomever. She says that it is easy to use.
283.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

284.author: Gabby
284.review: Still learning but like my camera so far. I like the ability to set it on a manual program and focus my own shot. It takes great quality pictures and videos. It is turning out to be fairly simple to work with so many options.
284.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

285.author: MaRiT
285.review: Just updated my T6i to the 80D and am totally happy with my new purchase. I was happy with my t6i but was ready to take my photography skills to the next level. The pictures are sharp and the camera is easy to use. It is obvious how much of better of a camera it is.
285.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

286.author: Reare373
286.review: I love this camera!! I am a beginner to photography and so far it has been very easy for me to use. I read the book that came with it and it helped tremendously to learn the different functions of the camera. So glad I finally purchased this product!!
286.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

287.author: xaytama
287.review: Granted it's not your top of the line camera but it's still pretty sweet. Takes nice photos, easy to operate, and not too ridiculously priced (bought mine during black friday 2016). My wife has had for a few months and have been pretty satisfied with it. It makes a great gift I can tell you that:)
287.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

288.author: Jeff
288.review_title: Great DSLR camera for getting started
288.review: After lots of research this camera along with the 2x lenses was the best to start my journey in using DSLR kit. It's the challenge of finding the right camera at the price break I could afford. So far I've really enjoyed learning and getting some great photos along the way.
288.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

289.author: Trina
289.review: I bought this to take pictures at bodybuilding competitions and for family vacations. I couldn't be more pleased. I have 2 lenses and they accommodated all my needs. I got great quality photos and is so easy to use, even my 12 year old took good pictures
289.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

290.author: Victor
290.review: I bought this camera as a gift for a friend, who needed a camera for his job as a club promoter. So far he has enjoyed the camera immensely and says that the quality meets the needs of his employer. I recommend this camera for those who are interested in buying their first high quality camera.
290.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

291.author: Cassandra
291.review: I bought this camera right before I was going to be giving birth because I didn't want to miss a single moment!! This camera is so great that I have even taken a friends wedidng photos and some friends maternity pics! It's been so good and easy to use and learn how to really all the features!!
291.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

292.author: Dpage
292.review: After owning this camera for a few days, I've got to say it is exactly what I needed for my first ever DSLR. It shoots great, and came with two lenses so I am able to shoot the shots I need with ease.
292.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

293.author: Parsons8589
293.review: Had this camera for almost a year now and it has been great. I’m a beginner with DSLR cameras and this was easy to learn to take a variety of photos from landscapes to portraits. Definitely recommend!
293.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

294.author: Alexa
294.review: I was more than satisfied with my purchase of my Canon T6.It was everything I wanted in a camera and much more.I have since sent 3 of my friends to purchase one and they as well are very happy with their cameras.I would recommend shopping Best Buy for any of their future purchases.
294.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

295.author: jamcleod
295.review: Loved the camera. Takes outstanding pictures. Have yet to figure out how to work the zoom feature on the camera. Nothing we do keeps. Also, the battery charger's life was terrible. We had it less than 1 month and it would no longer charge the battery.
295.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

296.author: 100DegreeSummer
296.review: Purchased this kit for my granddaughter. She needed it for a photography class that required a DSLR. She loves it and that photos are pretty good... actually better than I thought that they would be for a kit lense.
296.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

297.author: Priya
297.review: I love this camera. I am not a fan of the tripod or the wide and telephoto lens attachments, but for the price of the bundle I am very pleased!! I am new to photography and feel this is the perfect kit for a beginner like myself. I highly recommend this camera and kit!!
297.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

298.author: Jessica
298.review: I went to Best Buy looking for an affordable camera and was led to this camera from another brands representative. This camera is easy to use yet takes amazing pictures. I bought it for myself for Christmas and have not had any problems so far. Great investment!
298.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

299.author: remmenecker
299.review: This camera is my first attempt at a "real" camera. It isn't completely automatic and I am learning how to use every option on it. The lenses don't seem to be of the very best quality, otherwise, the camera takes great pictures and it is suitable for my photography classes.
299.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

300.author: Joseph
300.review: Our daughter has taken up photography and loves the Cannon Rebel. The photography department at her school is working with her and they have informed me that the Rebel is an outstanding starter camera and well worth the cost. Our daughter couldn't agree more. We highly recommend this camera.
300.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

301.author: Laki
301.review: I purchased this camera as a gift for my daughter and she loves it. She uses it for her photography class in school as well as taking pictures everywhere! I got it on sale and the included extras were a real bonus for her. Very happy with this purchase.
301.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

302.author: asutt
302.review_title: Great Camera for all around use
302.review: I bought this camera for my high school daughter who had an interest in photography. It was easy to use right out of the box and she's been taking pictures with it daily! The pictures look amazing! Love the capability to transfer photos easily to mobile device.
302.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

303.author: Will
303.review: We got this as a first time camera. We have enjoyed taking shots of our kids while playing sports. We have used it for family reunion photos. We look forward to using it on our international travels. It has been easy to use and the information that comes with it is very helpful.
303.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

304.author: Priscillaxo
304.review: I'm a beginner and the quality for pictures is good, but I'm still trying to learn the best settings for videos. It's frustrating sometimes as videos will sometimes come out blurry with auto settings. If anyone knows any good links or tutorials for this please let me know.
304.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

305.author: Manny
305.review: We bought this camera for our first road trip and loved it. Took amazing pictures to remember the trip and keep those memories alive. Very much recommend this camera for first time buyers or anyone in search of a good easy to use camera. We love it.
305.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

306.author: hdwilcutt
306.review: It is easy to use, perfect for a beginner. The overall price was a great deal. The quality is amazing. My only issue is that the screen is built in, so it is not ideal for taking selfies or filming yourself. I've just started filming with a mirror behind the camera, so the problem is solved.
306.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

307.author: SL2016
307.review: I received this camera kit as an anniversary present and I loved it. I have been able to capture high quality images and refine my photo taking skills. I was always a Nikon user until receiving this gift and I can honestly say the transition to Canon has been very comfortable.
307.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

308.author: TheCleaningLady
308.review: Our young lady is taking a yearbook class and fell in love with this camera, so we purchased it for Christmas present. I have played with it many times and it takes awesome shots, & lightweight.
308.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

309.author: 7t3shark
309.review: I got this for a great price over Christmas. It came with wide angle and telephoto zoom lenses and a nice carry bag. This was an upgrade from my "80s Minolta SLR 35mm film camera. While I'm still learning to use it, it seems perfect for sports action shots.
309.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

310.author: shap
310.review: To be determined, my daughter was looking for a camera that had more flexibility than her cell phone. Interchangeable lens and easy operation were key considerations. Have several Cannon point and shoot cameras for our business and we like the ease of operation.
310.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

311.author: Rzrbk63
311.review_title: This is a very good lower end SLR camera
311.review: I bought this camera to use at my office to take photos of various things. It was a very good price for everything that came with the camera. Canon is a great brand. So far I have been very pleased with this camera and the ease of use. I definitely recommend.
