311.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

312.author: blabarre
312.review: The Canon camera with the two lenses and camera carrying case are everything needed to have photo flexibility. Will come in handy when taking trip along with great home and family photos. The Canon reputation is excellent and the camera performs wonderfully.
312.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

313.author: Senthil
313.review_title: Great service! Camera came very quickly and works
313.review: Great service! Camera came very quickly and works great. Loved all the accessories that came with my camera! Everything came exactly as it was shown in the picture. The bag is great and spacious and holds a lot. Loved the bundle. All this stuff for the price was definitely a great deal!
313.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

314.author: Shane
314.review: Amazing camera with great versatility! I bought this camera for my daughter that just started a photography class. She was more than thrilled to see the pictures this camera produced. The pictures had great clarity in low light as well as outdoor lighting conditions.
314.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

315.author: Rolltide
315.review:
This was a lot of camera for a beginner and so easy to use. This camera took such nice pictures on the standard settings, I was amazed. 
Changing between the multiple lenses that came in the pack was easy and the larger lense brought whatever you are shooting so close.
315.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

316.author: ffs5
316.review: Wanted something that was easy enough for a beginner but options for better pictures and can add better lenses as I progress. I am still learning but so far it has been easy to handle and love that I can download via wifi the pictures right to my phone to send to others quickly.
316.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

317.author: Krisco
317.review:
The T6 canon camera is great!
I took it to my vacation in Egypt and the 2 lences the camera comes with were fantastic, and the fact that I can put the pictures in my phone and computer inmidiately via wifi / Bluetooth is great. I was able to post pictures instantly.
317.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

318.author: Shabooboo
318.review:
Best Buy were having a sale on this item, so it was a great opportunity to pick up a new SLR camera with a great zoom lens.

It's simple enough to get started with, I plan on learning more about some of the finer functions while on vacation. Gonna be time to consult the manual.
318.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

319.author: Tony
319.review: Everything you want in a camera at that price. Clear quality pictures the only draw back is you can't take rapid fire shots. It only allows you to snap off 3 shots in a burst. But other then that it's a great camera.
319.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

320.author: moviewatcher25
320.review: I bought this camera twice, one for each of my daughters. They both have used them for different activities. One took action shots for the school yearbook and the other more pictures of family and friends. The camera is easy to use and takes great pictures.
320.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

321.author: Pshizzle
321.review: I took me a little bit to figure out how to use it, but the lenses are easy to put on and take off! It is an amazing camera, a very high quality and I have loved every moment with it! I would recommend and if I didn't buy it and was looking for a camera right now I would repurchase!
321.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

322.author: John
322.review_title: Great camera - better than 90% of Cell phones
322.review: The camera comes with two lenses which can be easily changed for close up and distant pictures. The automatic focus results in exceptionally clear images and the more distant lens seems to be unaffected by minor shaking. Great camera!
322.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

323.author: StacyH
323.review: I am a beginner photographer and wanted to find a good camera to start with. The Canon T6 made it so easy for me to learn, and the autofocus really helps take a great picture! I am overly satisfied, especially when I take pictures of landscapes. Pictures are crisp and clear.
323.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

324.author: Sarnben

326.author: dmk4life

327.author: pwhiterv

I had a Canon for 10 years and need a new camera so I bought another Canon. After, bring it home I was not happy with the quality of the photos. The lines really needs to have a stabilizer on it and the new camera didn't '-( 
so I returned it and get the Nikon D3400 GREAT Camera.

330.author: NWilde

330.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

331.author: KidHub

331.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

332.author: LVGJ

332.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

333.author: mils

333.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

334.author: DBQHawk

334.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

335.author: Jenn

335.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

336.author: Chinmaya

337.author: regus2

337.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

338.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

339.author: Stell22
339.review_title: Great deal; bought it as a gift

339.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

340.author: Sisty
340.review: I have an older Rebel, but felt it was time to upgrade. This new Canon EOS Rebel T6 is absolutely wonderful to use. I would recommend this to anyone who likes to take photos. You can use it in full auto mode or you can use it choosing your own settings.
340.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

341.author: jasmall2

341.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

342.author: ixtimes

She recently got into taking artistic photos and this was her graduation present. It has great battery life. She really appreciates the picture quality, even when she zooms in really tight, the picture remains crystal clear. 
This has been a great camera for her.
342.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

345.author: Moppit
345.review_title: Great for learning and exploring manual.
345.review:
Just getting serious. 
This was my first camera I bought new. All other gear has been used. Great price point. 
Sturdy feel. Little to no flex in body. 18-55 IS good start but plastic mount. 
75-300 good but not IS. 
Overall good value and good product. I love mine

347.author: MiamiHeat6

The camera is extremely user friendly and is light enough to carry all day with no discomfort.
The picture quality is very good.
I let my grandkids use the camera and they got some exceptional dusk shots.
A good camera and affordable, highly recommend it for the average user
347.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

Camera body is very light weight and lensed are easy to change out. I would like a larger photo display

351.author: Ti421

Highly Recommended for anyone who is looking for a entry level DSLR

Im a beginner at photography and this was my first big purchase towards that! I am truly in love with the quality of thr camera and the performance 
Its so easy to use. I wpuld definately recommend for a beginner

Photos directly to my phone or my laptop.
